title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Kyrie Irving flipping off the Celtics fans during their last second loss to Boston in the playoffs and why it's time for Brooklyn to embrace their villain identity. He praises the Warriors for their winning culture and how it makes a difference in the postseason. He tells you why he was right about Kyler Murray and wrong about the Clippers. Plus, NBA veteran Olden Polynice joins the show to tell Colin how the NBA's superstars should handle heckling fans. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
